dcterms:description: DDAD is a dataset designed for full surround monodepth, containing data collected in urban settings across cities in the US and Japan. It includes 12,650 training samples, each with frames from 6 camera views, and 3,950 validation samples with ground truth depth available.
dcterms:title: DDAD

dcterms:creator: Holger Caesar

Giancarlo Baldan
Oscar Beijbom
dcterms:description: nuScenes is a multimodal dataset for autonomous driving, containing 1,000 sequences of videos collected in Boston and Singapore. It includes 700 sequences for training, 150 for validation, and 150 for testing.
dcterms:title: nuScenes
